The worst of the bad hair days can be quickly turned around with the help of the right brush; all you need is the perfect tool so you can smooth out hair problems with only a single stroke of your hair brush. Roots has always ensured that hair styling is not only the art of a professional but every individual. The Roots Shell Finish Styling Brush-RTS34 is a flat brush and an easy way to get your hair looking gorgeous and salon styled any time you like. Made with nylon bristles
column17:
the brush will treat your hair with gentle care so there is no breakage or damage. Style and smooth your hair with this brush and you will enjoy perfect hairstyles everyday.

column18: this ensures snag-free styling and you can run your fingers through hair that feels silky and soft. This flat brush suits thick hair whether long or short because the 6-8 rows of bristles are placed in straight tufts to keep your hair tended to with care. Ideal for men and women
column19: the brush is crafted in a medium size so it fits comfortably in your hands and you can style your hair whichever way you\u2019d like. With the rounded tip of this brush
column20: your scalp will stay relaxed and soothed through all the styling so your hair roots are kept healthy and stimulated. As you brush your hair everyday

the bristles will gently massage the scalp so your roots are made stronger and firmer.

Who doesn’t want a head full of bouncy curls that instantly perks you up and prepares you for a promising day ahead. You can flaunt a tempting trail of curls with Roots Round Brush-2011 that becomes an object of envy. Suitable for all hair types
column13: this roller brush allows you to effortlessly and efficiently curl your tresses. This brush not only curls straight hair but has a reverse function of straightening curly or wavy hair. This brush can be used by men and women who want to add a dash of zing to their hair. By rolling and pulling into sections and gently teasing the roots
column14:
this round brush adds volume to your straight hair.

\r\n

\r\n\tThis Roots brush is more than just a grooming tool as it is built with round-tipped bristles that gently massages your scalp as it strokes your hair. Apart from the massaging effect it also cleans your scalp by removing loose scales that gets collected over time. It even helps spread out the oils evenly across your scalp. You can fashion wayward and soft curls that add a shot of glamour to your normal attire. Adorned with sensuous and curved locks

unleash the free-spirited and effervescent persona within you.
